# twoDigits

**Type Property**

The custom format style that represents the two-digit numeric year in week-of-year calendars, zero-padded or truncated if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
static var twoDigits: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.YearForWeekOfYear { get }
```

## Modifying a Year for Week-of-Year

- **defaultDigits**: Custom week of the year format style showing the minimum number of digits that represents the year in week-of-year calendars.
- **padded(_:)**: Returns a custom format style that represents the three or more digits of the year in week-of-year calendars, zero-padded if necessary.
